title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 254: Featuring Josh Hennessy
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Josh Hennessy. Josh joins (41:51) to talk about his friendship with Whit, playing for his hometown team, playing in Russia and more. The boys also talk coronavirus, some NHL signings, Tom Brady leaving New England and a bunch more. Then the guys wrap up with Whit talking about the USGA (02:06:03).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
